summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of DDW Agency homepage completed. All major features working correctly including hero slider (5 slides), TrustBar stats, navigation dropdowns, service pages (4), and industry pages (4). Mobile responsive design works with hamburger menu functional.

issues: TrustBar '$1.08M' stat is slightly cut off on tablet viewport - shows as '$1.08' without the 'M'

passed_tests: Homepage loads correctly with all sections
Hero slider shows 5 slides with real ad performance data (€69.7K→418K, 15,594 conversions, 517 calls, 4,644 calls, 317 purchases)
HookSection shows updated messaging about $683K/month ad spend and 300-600% ROAS
Portfolio section shows 4 case studies with verified results
Services section shows 4 services with pricing
Contact section shows '3 Spots Available in March 2026' badge
Navbar dropdown menus work for Services and Industries
Mobile hamburger menu opens and closes
context_for_next_testing_agent: All pages and navigation tested. Hero slider auto-advances every 6 seconds and has manual controls. All 4 service pages and 4 industry pages are accessible via dropdown menus and direct URLs. Mobile menu closes after navigation.
